title: Better supply and demand drive PV sales to new monthly record
description: Passenger vehicle sales in India reached a new high for February last month, according to data from Siam. Two-wheeler sales fell short of the pre-Covid February 2020 record. The industry expects the growth momentum to continue.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
